summary: Remove noise when casting magic for: Alteration (Ironflesh); Conjuration (Conjure Attronach & Bound Weapon); Destruction (Sparks, Lightning Bolt, Frostbite & Icy Spear); Flames, Firebolt, Fireball, Fire Storm; Cloak; Restoration
descriptionHtml:
This will slightly remove the noise from some of magic spells in Skyrim. I personally prefer the music, ambiance, weather sound etc compare to exploding sound when casting spell, more balanced. In this version noice are reduce from:
1. Alteration (Ironflesh)
2. Conjuration (Conjure Attronach & Bound Weapon)
3. Destruction (Sparks, Lightning Bolt, Frostbite & Icy Spear)
4. Flames, Firebolt, Fireball, Fire Storm
5. Cloak
6. Restoration

[youtube]QnUgdLFgGTI[/youtube]

Install: NMM/Copy to game folder
Uninstall: Delete folder
Skyrim/Data/sound/fx/mag

Endorse if you like this.
Thanks :)
author: 5poiler
